text: This subchapter, including its table of contents, may be cited as the "Horizontal Property Act of the District of Columbia."
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 45-1701.

1973 Ed., § 5-901.

Miscellaneous Notes

Supersedure of chapter: The provisions of this chapter have been superseded by the provisions of Chapter 19 of this title. See § 42-1901.01(c).

DC CODE § 42-2001

Current through December 11, 2012
